I've spent the last decade working in tech as a product manager and software engineer. I'm now taking some time off to explore my interest in philosophy and the arts. I plan to share my thoughts here. Some will be more logical arguments in the form of essays, others more artistic in the form of poetry and short fiction.

Topics will likely be all over the place, but I tend to read and think a lot about political systems, economics, and the philosophy of science, particularly what these subjects reveal about human nature.
